pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 28, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 28, 2017:

Kenora, Ontario

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a boat tour of Lake of the Woods.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ and will deliver brief remarks.

South Harbourfront Parking Lot
Bernier Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at the Thistles Pavilion no later than 10:30 a.m.

Winnipeg, Manitoba

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Winnipeg, Brian Bowman.

Mayor’s Office, City Hall
510 Main Street     

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, Carla Qualtrough, will take part in the Canada Games Opening Ceremonies.

Bell MTS Center
345 Graham Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for Prime Minister’s remarks
  • Media should arrive via the Hargrave street entrance no later than 6:00 p.m.
